messages.en: my main working tool is Python, without forgetting SQL and Google Cloud's BigQuery. And, yes, as this website design suggests, I use Linux. I'm a huge fan of minimalism (KISS!) in software and a huge fan of Flask, but I have experience with NodeJS and Django behind as well

I like to think of myself as a front-end developer for the sake of it, for the fun. After all, it's the place where esthetics and the logical world of coding overlap! I work to get better every day and help others, as a volunteer at Refugees Code
